code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/Navbar.css";import ReorderIcon from"@material-ui/icons/Reorder";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[expandNavbar,setExpandNavbar]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{setExpandNavbar(false);},[location]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",id:expandNavbar?"open":"close",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toggleButton",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{setExpandNavbar(prev=>!prev);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReorderIcon,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:" Home "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/projects",children:" Projects "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/experience",children:" Experience "})]})]});}export default Navbar;
